form.name: feeding_problems_low_weight_for_age_two
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: Feeding Problems, Low Weight for Age> Feeding Problems, Low Weight for Age TWO

field.name: If baby has no indications for urgent hospital referral, then do the following:
Has the infant been breastfed in the last hour?
If no: ask mother to put her baby to the breast. Observe breastfeeding for 4 min
If yes: ask the mother if she can wait and tell you when the infant is willing is feed again
